entry.value: Shows how to use the foreign library to read data into KNIME

# The foreign library provides access to many 3rd party data formats.%%00010# Just a few examples are listed below, many others exist. %%00010# More details cran.r-project.org/web/packages/foreign/foreign.pdf %%00010%%00010library(foreign)%%00010%%00010# map filepath from a flow variable here.%%00010path = "<PathToFile>"%%00010%%00010# Read SPSS%%00010data = read.spss(path) %%00010%%00010# Read SAS XPORT%%00010data = read.xport(path) %%00010%%00010#Read STATA file%%00010data = read.dta(path)%%00010%%00010knime.out <- data
